message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to let it go for $15,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $10,000?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $10,000 is a bit too low for me to consider, I'm willing to come down to $13,500. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but $13,500 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $11,000?
